name: Checklist for Dark Souls 3
description: [Please note: Unfortunately, the checklist doesnt run on older Android-Systems (<4.4)!]  Checklist to collect all Gestures, Wonders, Pyromancies, Rings and Sorceries in Dark Souls 3.  Thats how it works:  - Tap an item to save it to your list of collected items - Hold an item to start a Google-search for the item - Tap the eye symbol to show / hide already collected items
